HoursOfOperationConfig.description: Contains information about the hours of operation.

properties.name: Day
properties.description: The day that the hours of operation applies to.

type.description: The day that the hours of operation applies to.

properties.name: EndTime
properties.description: The end time that your contact center closes.

type.description: The end time that your contact center closes.

properties.name: StartTime
properties.description: The start time that your contact center opens.

type.description: The start time that your contact center opens.

HoursOfOperationTimeSlice.description: The start time or end time for an hours of operation.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is maximum of 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is maximum of 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Config
properties.description: Configuration information for the hours of operation: day, start time, and end time.

type.description: Configuration information for the hours of operation: day, start time, and end time.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description of the hours of operation.

type.description: The description of the hours of operation.

properties.name: InstanceArn
properties.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance.

type.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the hours of operation.

type.description: The name of the hours of operation.

properties.name: TimeZone
properties.description: The time zone of the hours of operation.

type.description: The time zone of the hours of operation.

properties.name: HoursOfOperationArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the hours of operation.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the hours of operation.
